title: Katie Price still sings duets she did with Peter Andre to boyfriends
text:
It’s hard to get over a good singing partner (Picture: Rex/Getty)

It seems Katie Price still can’t get enough of her duets album with ex-husband Peter Andre, even singing along to them in front of her boyfriends.

The 41-year-old released the critically-panned A Whole New World in 2006 while still married to Peter, but apparently it’s still her go to karaoke LP when entertaining.

A source told The Sun Online: ‘Katie still has the CD in the house and will often put it on loud when she has friends over so she can have a few drinks and sing along to the tracks.

‘She’s not shy about belting it out in front of her boyfriends either – but she has a hard time remembering all the words.”

So far Katie hasn’t had anything to say in response to the claims.

Katie married Peter in 2005 and split in 2009 (Picture: REX/Shutterstock)

The 12 track record features covers of classics such as Islands In The Stream and I’ve Had The Time Of My Life and charted at number 20 in the UK upon its release.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Model and mum of five Katie spent years trying to be top of the pops, with very mixed results.

In 2005 she attempted to represent the UK in the Eurovision song contest — while wearing a pink PVC catsuit and heavily pregnant.

Katie Price onstage during a dress rehearsal for Eurovision (Picture: PA Archive)

In 2009 a non-auto-tuned version of her vocals in her A Whole New World duet with ex-husband Peter Andre went viral after being leaked, with commentators comparing her ‘wailing’ to ‘fighting cats’.

Katie then released a single in 2010 called Free to Love Again, which limped in at No.60 in the charts.

And two years ago she sang new song I Got U live on Loose Women, only to be mocked again.

Afterwards she tweeted: ‘Enjoyed myself living my dream. I can’t win if I sing live or mime but I don’t care.’

Katie and Kris are on again

Meanwhile, Katie is officially back together with her ex Kris Boyson amid cheating claims, reportedly even moving him into her home again.

The pair split in the summer amid allegations she had cheated on him with Charles Drury, a builder who was working on her home – whom she has now reportedly cheated on with Kris – but now insiders close to Pricey have suggested that the pair are ‘officially back on’.

Pals of Katie’s told Metro.co.uk that she knew she had ‘some explaining to do’ after she was pictured sneaking out of her ex-boyfriend Kris’s house after spending the night.

Advertisement

Advertisement

But now it has been claimed that Kris has ‘taken her back and they’re already moving some of his things back into the house.

A source exclusively told The Sun Online: ‘He’s taken her back and they’re already moving some of his things back into the house.

‘They’re officially back on – everyone’s shocked that he didn’t make it harder for her, but they’re back to being loved-up again like they never split up’.

description: It seems Katie Price still can't get enough of her duets album with ex-husband Peter Andre, even singing along to them in front of her boyfriends.
